de.simonschuler.ba.obd2

Class OBD2Service

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.simonschuler.ba.obd2.Obd2Service
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Obd2, java.lang.Runnable

    public class OBD2Service
extends java.lang.Object
implements Obd2, java.lang.Runnable
    this class implements Runnable and dose all the bluetooth and OBD2 things in the background

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        When an object implementing interface Runnable is used to create a thread, starting the thread causes the object's run method to be called in that separately executing thread.

        The general contract of the method run is that it may take any action whatsoever.

        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        See Also:
        Thread.run()
